fields.name: Draw Letters:
fields.value: Receive a random list of living players based on your score. Target half (rounded up) and learn one random letter from their role. This ability is astral.

fields.name: Place Word (3x):
fields.value: Target a player on whom you previously used Draw Letters. Guess their role. If correct, the entire town will receive a message "The scrabble player has placed the word [role name]!" This ability may be multitasked.

fields.name: Take Turns (Passive):
fields.value: You are immune to roleblocks and your defense power is doubled on odd-numbered nights.

fields.name: Table Flip (Locked):
fields.value: Unlocked when you successfully guess two roles with Place Word. You may attack all of them with 5.0x attack power.
